trans-unit.source: Displays the values of a single record from a data source in a table, where each data row represents a field of the record.
trans-unit.target: 從資料表的資料來源顯示單一資料錄的值，其中每個資料列都代表資料錄的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control allows you to edit, delete, and insert records.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項可讓您編輯、刪除及插入記錄。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#introduction)
trans-unit.target: [簡介](#introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Row Fields](#row_fields)
trans-unit.target: [資料列欄位](#row_fields)

trans-unit.source: [Binding to Data](#binding_to_data)
trans-unit.target: [繫結至資料](#binding_to_data)

trans-unit.source: [Security](#security)
trans-unit.target: [安全性](#security)

trans-unit.source: [Data Operations](#data_operations)
trans-unit.target: [資料作業](#data_operations)

trans-unit.source: [Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface)
trans-unit.target: [自訂使用者介面](#customizing_the_user_interface)

trans-unit.source: [Events](#events)
trans-unit.target: [事件](#events)

trans-unit.source: [Accessibility](#Accessibility)
trans-unit.target: [協助工具選項](#Accessibility)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax)
trans-unit.target: [宣告式語法](#DeclarativeSyntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 簡介

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is used to display a single record from a data source in a table, where each field of the record is displayed in a row of the table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項用來從資料來源的單一記錄顯示在資料表中，其中每個記錄的欄位會顯示在資料表資料列。

trans-unit.source: It can be used in combination with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control for master-detail scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 用於搭配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>主版詳細資料案例的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control supports the following features:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項支援下列功能：

trans-unit.source: Binding to data source controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至資料來源控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>。

trans-unit.source: Built-in inserting capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 內建的插入功能。

trans-unit.source: Built-in updating and deleting capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 內建更新和刪除功能。

trans-unit.source: Built-in paging capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 內建的分頁功能。

trans-unit.source: Programmatic access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> object model to dynamically set properties, handle events, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 以程式設計方式存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>物件模型，以動態方式設定屬性、 處理事件，等等。

trans-unit.source: Customizable appearance through themes and styles.
trans-unit.target: 透過佈景主題和樣式的可自訂外觀。

trans-unit.source: Row Fields
trans-unit.target: 資料列欄位

trans-unit.source: Each data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is created by declaring a field control.
trans-unit.target: 在每個資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>藉由宣告欄位控制項建立控制項。

trans-unit.source: Different row field types determine the behavior of the rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: 不同的資料列欄位型別決定控制項中的資料列的行為。

trans-unit.source: Field controls derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>.
trans-unit.target: 欄位控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different row field types that can be used.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的不同的資料列欄位型別。

trans-unit.source: Column field type
trans-unit.target: 資料行欄位類型

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Displays the value of a field in a data source as text.
trans-unit.target: 以文字中顯示資料來源中欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: Displays a command button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示命令按鈕在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to display a row with a custom button control, such as an Add or a Remove button.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您顯示具有自訂按鈕控制項，例如新增或移除按鈕的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Displays a check box in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在核取方塊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This row field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料列的欄位型別通常用於顯示具有布林值的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Displays built-in command buttons to perform edit, insert, or delete operations in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示內建命令按鈕來執行編輯、 插入或刪除作業<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源中的欄位的值顯示為超連結。

trans-unit.source: This row field type allows you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料列的欄位型別可讓您將第二個欄位繫結至超連結的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Displays an image in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在影像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Displays user-defined content for a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control according to a specified template.
trans-unit.target: 顯示使用者定義的內容中的資料列的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項根據指定的範本。

trans-unit.source: This row field type allows you to create a custom row field.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料列的欄位型別可讓您建立自訂的資料列的欄位。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property is set to `true`, which automatically generates a bound row field object for each field of a bindable type in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>屬性設定為`true`，這會自動產生資料來源繫結的資料列欄位物件，可繫結類型的每個欄位。

trans-unit.source: Valid bindable types are <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Guid>, and the set of primitive types.
trans-unit.target: 有效的可繫結類型為<xref:System.String>， <xref:System.DateTime>， <xref:System.Decimal>， <xref:System.Guid>，與基本型別的集合。

trans-unit.source: Each field is then displayed in a row as text, in the order in which each field appears in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 每個欄位然後顯示資料列中為文字，每個欄位出現在資料來源中的順序。

trans-unit.source: Automatically generating the rows provides a quick and easy way to display every field in the record.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生資料列提供快速簡便的方式來顯示記錄中的每個欄位。

trans-unit.source: However, to make use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control's advanced capabilities you must explicitly declare the row fields to include in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 不過，要使用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項的進階的功能，您必須明確宣告中包含的資料列欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To declare the row fields, first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要宣告的資料列的欄位，請先設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Next, add opening and closing `<Fields>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，加入 開啟和關閉`<Fields>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Finally, list the row fields that you want to include between the opening and closing `<Fields>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 最後，列出您想要包含在開頭和結尾之間的資料列欄位`<Fields>`標記。

trans-unit.source: The row fields specified are added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection in the order listed.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資料列欄位都會加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>集合的順序列出。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection allows you to programmatically manage the row fields in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>集合可讓您以程式設計方式管理中的資料列欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Automatically generated row fields are not added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生的資料列欄位不會加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Explicitly declared row fields can be displayed in combination with automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: 明確宣告的資料列欄位可顯示與自動產生的資料列欄位一起使用。

trans-unit.source: When both are used, explicitly declared row fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: 同時使用時，明確宣告的資料列會首先呈現欄位，後面接著會自動產生的資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: Binding to Data
trans-unit.target: 繫結至資料

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control can be bound to a data source control (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control) or to any data source collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface, such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or other collection types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項可以繫結至資料來源控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項) 或任何資料來源集合中實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面，例如<xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或其他集合型別。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the following methods to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to the appropriate data source type:
trans-unit.target: 使用下列方法的其中一個繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項至適當的資料來源類型：

trans-unit.source: To bind to a data source control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> value of the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 若要繫結至資料來源控制項，將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>資料來源控制項的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項自動繫結至指定的資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred method to bind to data.
trans-unit.target: 這是慣用的方法繫結至資料。

trans-unit.source: To bind to a data source that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface, programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to the data source and then call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至資料來源實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面，以程式設計方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制權傳輸至資料來源，然後呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information on data binding, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: 如需資料繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。

trans-unit.source: Security
trans-unit.target: 安全性

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input.
trans-unit.target: 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。

trans-unit.source: Data Operations
trans-unit.target: 資料作業

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control provides built-in capabilities that allow the user to update, delete, insert, and page through items in the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項提供內建功能，允許使用者更新、 刪除、 插入和控制項中的項目頁面上。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is bound to a data source control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating, deleting, inserting, and paging functionality.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項所繫結至資料來源控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項可以讓您利用資料來源控制項的功能，並提供自動更新、 刪除、 插入和分頁功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control can provide support for update, delete, insert, and paging operations with other types of data sources; however, you must provide the implementation for these operations in an appropriate event handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項可以為 update、 delete、 insert 和分頁作業與其他類型的資料來源提供的支援; 不過，您必須提供適當的事件處理常式中的這些作業的實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control can automatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> row field with an Edit, Delete, or New button by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateEditButton%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateInsertButton%2A> properties to `true`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項可自動將新增<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>包含編輯、 刪除或新增按鈕所設定的資料列欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateEditButton%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateInsertButton%2A>屬性`true`分別。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the Delete button (which deletes the selected record immediately), when the Edit or New button is clicked, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control goes into edit or insert mode, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 不同於 [刪除] 按鈕 （這會立即刪除選取的記錄），按一下 [編輯] 或 [新增] 按鈕時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>編輯，或分別插入模式中，控制項便會進入。

trans-unit.source: In edit mode, the Edit button is replaced with an Update and a Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 在編輯模式中，編輯 按鈕會取代的更新 和 取消 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Input controls that are appropriate for the field's data type (such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> or a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control) are displayed with a field's value for the user to modify.
trans-unit.target: 輸入適用於該欄位的資料類型的控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控制項) 會顯示與使用者修改欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source, while clicking the Cancel button abandons any changes.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 更新 按鈕更新資料來源中的記錄，而按一下取消 5d; 按鈕會放棄所有變更。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, in insert mode, the New button is replaced with an Insert and a Cancel button, and empty input controls are displayed for the user to enter the values for the new record.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，在插入模式下，新增 按鈕會取代 Insert 和 取消 5d; 按鈕，並讓使用者輸入新記錄的值會顯示空白的輸入的控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can also manually define the update, delete, and insert command buttons in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> row field.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以手動定義 update、 delete 和 insert 命令按鈕在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control recognizes buttons with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property set to "Edit", "Update", "Delete", "New", "Insert", or "Cancel"; however, you still must provide the functionality yourself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項辨認按鈕與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>屬性設定為 「 編輯 」、 「 更新 」、 「 刪除 」、 「 新增 」、 「 插入 」，或 [取消]; 不過，您仍然必須提供功能自己。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control provides a paging feature, which allows the user to navigate to other records in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項提供分頁功能，可讓使用者巡覽至其他資料來源中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, page navigation controls are displayed in a pager row.
trans-unit.target: 啟用時，頁面導覽控制項會顯示在頁面巡覽區列。

trans-unit.source: To enable paging, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用分頁，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The pager row can be customized using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerSettings%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用自訂頁面巡覽區列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerSettings%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the User Interface
trans-unit.target: 自訂使用者介面

trans-unit.source: You can customize the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control by setting the style properties for different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以自訂的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>藉由設定控制項的不同部分的樣式屬性的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the style properties that you can set.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出您可以設定的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: Style property
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the alternating data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的交替資料列的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set, the data rows are displayed in bands, alternating between the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RowStyle%2A> settings and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: 當設定這個屬性時，資料列會顯示在群組列，交替<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RowStyle%2A>設定和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the row that contains the built-in command buttons.
trans-unit.target: 包含內建的命令按鈕的資料列樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the data rows when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定為資料列時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the empty data row that are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the data source does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 會顯示在空白資料列的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制當資料來源不包含任何記錄。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the footer row.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾資料列樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the header row.
trans-unit.target: 標頭資料列樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the data rows when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 樣式設定為資料列時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於插入模式。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the pager row.
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽區列樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的資料列的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> property is also set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RowStyle%2A> settings and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>屬性也設定時，資料列會顯示交替<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RowStyle%2A>設定和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the header column.
trans-unit.target: 標頭資料行樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: Events
trans-unit.target: 事件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control provides several events that you can program against.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項提供數個事件，您可以程式設計的。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您在事件發生時執行自訂的常式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出支援的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control also inherits these events from its base classes: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Disposed>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項也會繼承這些事件及其基底類別： <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Disposed>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event - 事件

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a button is clicked in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> 控制項中的按鈕時會發生這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> objects are created in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 在所有發生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>物件都會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to modify the values of a record before it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用於顯示之前修改記錄的值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a Delete button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control deletes the record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下的 [刪除] 按鈕，但之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來檢查刪除作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a Delete button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control deletes the record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下的 [刪除] 按鈕前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來取消刪除作業。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Insert button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下的 [插入] 按鈕，但之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項才會插入記錄。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用於檢查插入作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Insert button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下的 [插入] 按鈕前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項才會插入記錄。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來取消插入作業。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Update button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下的更新 按鈕，但之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項更新資料列。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查更新作業的結果通常使用這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Update button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下的更新 按鈕前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制更新的記錄。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來取消更新作業。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes modes (edit, insert, or read-only mode).
trans-unit.target: 之後，就會發生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項變更 （編輯、 插入或唯讀模式） 的模式。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to perform a task when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes modes.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來執行工作時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項變更模式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes modes (edit, insert, or read-only mode).
trans-unit.target: 發生於之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項變更 （編輯、 插入或唯讀模式） 的模式。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel a mode change.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來取消模式變更。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時發生 (但在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> 控制項處理分頁作業之後)。

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要執行的工作之後使用者巡覽至不同的記錄控制項中, 時，通常使用這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時，但是在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> 控制項處理分頁作業之前。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用於取消的分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 協助工具選項

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 宣告式語法

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in combination with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control for a simple master-detail scenario.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項結合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>簡單的主版詳細資料案例的控制項。

trans-unit.source: It displays the details of an item selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 它會顯示選取之項目的詳細資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to add, delete, and edit records.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來加入、 刪除和編輯的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively add row fields to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式，將資料列欄位加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>類別。

trans-unit.source: To dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to a page, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> object, set its properties, and then add it to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection of a container control, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder>.
trans-unit.target: 若要以動態方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項的頁面，建立新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>物件、 設定其屬性，並再將它加入<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>容器集合控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to a page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式，以動態方式將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>網頁的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the paging feature is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用分頁功能。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable the paging feature; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示啟用分頁功能，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has built-in paging capabilities, which allow a user to navigate to a different record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項具有內建的分頁功能，可讓使用者瀏覽至不同資料來源中的記錄。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control can perform both user interface (UI) and data source paging.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項可以執行使用者介面 (UI) 和資料來源分頁。

trans-unit.source: The UI paging feature can be used with any data source object that supports the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: UI 分頁功能可以搭配任何支援的資料來源物件<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面。

trans-unit.source: For each paging operation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control queries the data source for the entire data collection and selects the row to display, essentially discarding the remaining data.
trans-unit.target: 每個分頁作業，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制查詢的整個資料收集的資料來源，並選取要顯示的資料列基本上並捨棄其餘的資料。

trans-unit.source: If a data source implements <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A> property returns `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control will use data source paging instead of UI paging.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源實作<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanPage%2A>屬性會傳回`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項將會使用資料來源分頁，而不是 UI 分頁。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control will query for only the row needed for each paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項將會查詢每個分頁作業所需的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Thus, data source paging is more efficient than UI paging.
trans-unit.target: 因此，資料來源分頁會更有效率 UI 分頁。

trans-unit.source: Only the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> object supports data source paging without modification.
trans-unit.target: 只有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>物件支援未經修改的資料來源分頁。

trans-unit.source: To enable the paging feature, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用分頁功能，將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can determine the total number of items in the underlying data source by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用，以判斷基礎資料來源中的項目總數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageCount%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the currently displayed item, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷目前所顯示的項目索引，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled, an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 啟用分頁時，額外的資料列呼叫頁面巡覽列會自動顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains the page navigation controls and can be displayed at the top, bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control.
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽區列包含頁面導覽控制項，而且可以顯示在頂端、 底端，或最上層及控制項的底部。

trans-unit.source: The pager row has two built-in pager display modes: numbered pages and next and previous page links (default).
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽區列有兩個內建的頁面巡覽，顯示模式： 編號頁面和上一頁和下一頁連結 （預設值）。

trans-unit.source: The numbered pages mode displays links for the individual pages, allowing the user to navigate to a specific page.
trans-unit.target: 編號的頁面模式會顯示個別頁面，讓使用者巡覽至特定頁面的連結。

trans-unit.source: The next and previous links mode displays controls that allow the user to navigate to the next or the previous page.
trans-unit.target: 下一頁和上一頁連結模式顯示控制項，可讓使用者巡覽至下一頁或上一頁。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control automatically hides the pager row when the data source contains fewer than two records.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項自動隱藏頁面巡覽列，當資料來源包含兩個以上的記錄。

trans-unit.source: You can control the settings of the pager row (such as the pager display mode, the number of page links to display at a time, and the pager control's text label) by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用來控制的設定 （例如頁面巡覽區顯示模式，在時間和頁面巡覽區控制項的文字標籤顯示的頁面連結數目） 的頁面巡覽列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerSettings%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To control the appearance of the pager row (including its background color, font color, and position), use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制項目的出現的頁面巡覽列 （包括其背景色彩、 字型色彩和位置），使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control also allows you to define a custom template for the pager row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項也可讓您定義的頁面巡覽列的自訂範本。

trans-unit.source: For more information on creating a custom pager row template, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何建立自訂的頁面巡覽區列範本的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PagerTemplate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when paging occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項提供數個事件，您可以使用分頁發生時執行自訂動作。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available events.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的事件。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event - 事件

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時發生 (但在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> 控制項處理分頁作業之後)。

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used when you need to perform a task after the user navigates to a different record in the control.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要執行的工作之後使用者巡覽至不同的記錄控制項中, 時，通常使用這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下其中一個頁面巡覽區按鈕時，但是在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> 控制項處理分頁作業之前。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用於取消的分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> property to enable the paging capabilities of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性來啟用分頁功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of the alternating data rows in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓您設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中替代資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of alternating data rows in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中替代資料列的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of alternating data rows in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制資料中交替資料列的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RowStyle%2A> settings and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: 當設定這個屬性時，資料列會顯示交替<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RowStyle%2A>設定和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `AlternatingRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `AlternatingRowStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `AlternatingRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `AlternatingRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> property to specify the font and style settings for the alternating data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>屬性來指定替代資料列中的字型和樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the built-in control to delete the current record is displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出可刪除目前資料錄的內建控制項是否顯示於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the built-in control to delete the current record; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示顯示可刪除目前資料錄的內建控制項，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is bound to an object that inherits from <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanDelete%2A> property returns `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic deleting functionality.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項所繫結的物件，繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.CanDelete%2A>屬性會傳回`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項可以讓您利用資料來源控制項的功能，並提供自動正在刪除功能。

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object to delete data, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> object must be set with a delete query statement.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>要刪除的資料、 物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DeleteCommand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>基礎屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>物件必須使用刪除查詢陳述式來設定。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A> property is set to `true`, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> row field with a Delete button is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>資料列與 [刪除] 按鈕的欄位會自動顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Delete button permanently removes that record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 [刪除] 按鈕會永久地從資料來源中移除該記錄。

trans-unit.source: You must also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property for the automatic deletion feature to work.
trans-unit.target: 您也必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>自動刪除功能運作的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a record is deleted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項提供數個事件，可用來刪除記錄時執行自訂動作。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available events.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的事件。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event - 事件

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the Delete button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control deletes the record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下的 [刪除] 按鈕，但之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來檢查刪除作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the Delete button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control deletes the record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下的 [刪除] 按鈕前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制從資料來源中刪除記錄。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來取消刪除作業。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A> is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A>儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A> property to display the built-in control to delete the current record.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A>屬性來顯示內建的控制項，刪除目前的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the built-in controls to edit the current record are displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出可編輯目前資料錄的內建控制項是否顯示於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the built-in controls to edit the current record; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示顯示可編輯目前資料錄的內建控制項，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When a data source control that supports updating is bound to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic updating functionality.
trans-unit.target: 當支援更新的資料來源控制項繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項可以讓您利用資料來源控制項的功能，並提供自動更新功能。

trans-unit.source: For a data source control to update data, its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set with an update query statement.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源控制項來更新資料，其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.UpdateCommand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性必須使用 update 查詢陳述式來設定。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateEditButton%2A> property is set to `true`, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> row field with an Edit button is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateEditButton%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>資料列與 [編輯] 按鈕的欄位會自動顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Edit button puts that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 [編輯] 按鈕將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: When in edit mode, each bound field in the control that is not read-only displays the appropriate input control, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control, for the field's data type.
trans-unit.target: 處於編輯模式時，每個繫結的欄位不是唯讀的控制項中顯示適當的輸入的控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控制欄位的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: This allows the user to modify the field's value.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓使用者修改欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: When clicked, the Edit button is also replaced with an Update button and a Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 按一下時，編輯 按鈕也會取代的更新 按鈕和 取消 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source with any value changes and returns the control to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 [更新] 按鈕的任何值變更來更新資料來源中的記錄並傳回所指定模式的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Cancel button abandons any value changes and returns the control to the default mode.
trans-unit.target: 按一下取消 5d; 按鈕會放棄所有值變更，並傳回控制項的預設模式。

trans-unit.source: To put a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in edit mode programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 要放置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>以程式設計方式控制處於編輯模式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property is also set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control automatically ensures that the field or fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>屬性也會設為`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制會自動確定中指定的欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性是唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: Unless you implement your own updating functionality, you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property for the automatic updating feature to work.
trans-unit.target: 除非您實作自己的更新功能，您必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>自動更新功能運作的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance of the data rows when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EditRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以控制資料的外觀資料列時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯模式下使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EditRowStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a record is updated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項提供數個事件，可用來更新記錄時執行自訂動作。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available events.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的事件。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event - 事件

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the Update button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下的 [更新] 按鈕，但之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制更新的記錄。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查更新作業的結果通常使用這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the Update button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下的 [更新] 按鈕前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制更新的記錄。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來取消更新作業。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes modes.
trans-unit.target: 之後，就會發生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項變更模式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes modes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項變更模式。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the mode change.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來取消模式變更。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateEditButton%2A> is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateEditButton%2A>儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateEditButton%2A> property to display the built-in controls to edit the current record.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateEditButton%2A>屬性來顯示內建控制項來編輯目前的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the built-in controls to insert a new record are displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出可插入新資料錄的內建控制項是否顯示於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the built-in controls to insert a new record; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示顯示可插入新資料錄的內建控制項，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When a data source control that supports inserting is bound to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic inserting functionality.
trans-unit.target: 當支援插入的資料來源控制項繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項可以讓您利用資料來源控制項的功能，並提供自動插入功能。

trans-unit.source: For a data source control to insert data, its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property must be set with an insert query statement.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源控制項插入資料，其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性必須設定搭配 insert 查詢陳述式。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateInsertButton%2A> property is set to `true`, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> row field with a New button is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateInsertButton%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>與新的按鈕的資料列欄位會自動顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the New button puts that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 [新增] 按鈕將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>在插入模式下的控制項。

trans-unit.source: When in insert mode, each bound field in the control that is not read-only displays the appropriate input control, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control, for the field's data type.
trans-unit.target: 在插入模式下，每個繫結的欄位不是唯讀的控制項中顯示適當的輸入的控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控制欄位的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: This allows the user to enter the field's value for the new record.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓使用者輸入新資料錄欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: When clicked, the New button is also replaced with an Insert button and a Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 按一下時，[新增] 按鈕也會取代 [插入] 按鈕和 [取消] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Insert button inserts the new record in the data source and returns the control to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 [插入] 按鈕將新記錄插入資料來源中，並將控制權傳回所指定的模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Cancel button abandons the insert operation and returns the control to the default mode.
trans-unit.target: 按一下取消 5d; 按鈕時，會放棄插入作業，並傳回控制項的預設模式。

trans-unit.source: To put a row in insert mode programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式將一個資料列放在插入模式下，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance of a record that is in insert mode by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InsertRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以控制的是在插入模式下使用的記錄外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InsertRowStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control provides several events that you can use to perform a custom action when a new record is inserted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項提供數個事件，您可以使用新的記錄插入時執行自訂動作。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available events.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的事件。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event - 事件

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the Insert button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下的 [插入] 按鈕，但之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項才會插入記錄。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用於檢查插入作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the Insert button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下的 [插入] 按鈕前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項才會插入記錄。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來取消插入作業。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes modes.
trans-unit.target: 之後，就會發生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項變更模式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes modes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項變更模式。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the mode change.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用來取消模式變更。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateInsertButton%2A> is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateInsertButton%2A>儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateInsertButton%2A> property to display the built-in controls to insert a new record in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateInsertButton%2A>屬性來顯示要插入新記錄中的內建控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row fields for each field in the data source are automatically generated and displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出資料來源中每個欄位的資料列欄位是否會自動產生並顯示於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display automatically generated bound row fields for each field in the data source; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示顯示資料來源中每個欄位的自動產生繫結資料列欄位，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Each data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is represented by a row field.
trans-unit.target: 在每個資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項由資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property is set to `true`, an automatically generated bound row field is created for each field in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>屬性設定為`true`，每個欄位的資料來源中建立的自動產生的繫結資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: Each field is then displayed in a row as text, in the order in which each field appears in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 每個欄位然後顯示資料列中為文字，每個欄位出現在資料來源中的順序。

trans-unit.source: Automatically generated bound row fields are not added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生的繫結資料列欄位不會加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Automatically generating the rows provides a quick and easy way to display every field in the record.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生資料列提供快速簡便的方式來顯示記錄中的每個欄位。

trans-unit.source: However, to make use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control's advanced capabilities you must explicitly declare the row fields to include in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 不過，要使用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項的進階的功能，您必須明確宣告中包含的資料列欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Explicitly declared row fields can be used in combination with automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: 明確宣告的資料列欄位可用於與自動產生的資料列欄位搭配使用。

trans-unit.source: When both are used, explicitly declared row fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: 同時使用時，明確宣告的資料列會首先呈現欄位，後面接著會自動產生的資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property to automatically create bound row fields for each field in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>自動建立資料來源中的 繫結的資料列欄位，每個欄位的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display in the background of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要顯示於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項背景之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image to display in the background of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項背景之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BackImageUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to an image to display in the background of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BackImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定要顯示的背景影像的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the specified image is smaller than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the image is tiled to fill in the background.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的映像小於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項，影像會並排顯示以在背景填滿。

trans-unit.source: If the image is larger than the control, the image is cropped.
trans-unit.target: 如果影像大於此控制項，則會裁剪影像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BackImageUrl%2A> property to display a custom image in the background of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BackImageUrl%2A>屬性，在背景中顯示的自訂映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You must provide your own image for this example to work.
trans-unit.target: 您必須提供自己的映像，這個範例才能運作。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> object that represents the bottom pager row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> 物件，其表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中的底端頁面巡覽列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> that represents the bottom pager row in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中的底端頁面巡覽列。

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 啟用分頁時 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性`true`)，額外的資料列呼叫頁面巡覽列會自動顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control.
trans-unit.target: 頁面巡覽區列包含控制項，讓使用者巡覽至其他記錄，並可顯示頂端、 底部，或同時上方和底部的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BottomPagerRow%2A> property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object that represents the bottom pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BottomPagerRow%2A>屬性以程式設計方式存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>物件，表示內的底部頁面巡覽區列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BottomPagerRow%2A> property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control creates the bottom pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BottomPagerRow%2A>屬性之後，才可被<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項建立內的底部頁面巡覽區列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the bottom pager row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式管理下方的頁面巡覽區列，例如當加入自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BottomPagerRow%2A> property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: 修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BottomPagerRow%2A>後必須執行屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項已呈現，否則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項將會覆寫任何變更。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BottomPagerRow%2A> property to access the bottom pager row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BottomPagerRow%2A>屬性來存取的底端頁面巡覽區列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>期間控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controls within the custom pager row are then updated with the current page number and total number of pages.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制項會在自訂頁面巡覽區資料列中的再更新目前的頁碼與總頁數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項之 HTML 標題項目中呈現的文字。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項的 HTML 標題項目中呈現的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A> property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A>屬性來指定要呈現的 HTML 標題項目中的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the table that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的文字會提供具有可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的資料表描述的輔助技術裝置。

trans-unit.source: Additional accessibility support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CaptionAlign%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 其他可存取性支援<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項由提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CaptionAlign%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CaptionAlign%2A> property to specify the alignment of the HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CaptionAlign%2A>屬性來指定 HTML 標題項目中的對齊方式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A> is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A>儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A> property to specify the text for the HTML caption element rendered in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A>屬性的 HTML 標題項目呈現在指定的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中 HTML 標題項目的水平或垂直位置。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="TableCaptionAlign.NotSet" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CaptionAlign%2A> property to specify the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CaptionAlign%2A>屬性來指定 HTML 標題項目中的水平或垂直位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會設定使用其中一種<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值。

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The caption element is aligned with the bottom of the table.
trans-unit.target: 標題項目與資料表底端對齊。

trans-unit.source: The caption element is aligned with the left side of the table.
trans-unit.target: 標題項目與資料表左邊對齊。

trans-unit.source: The caption element's alignment is not set.
trans-unit.target: 未設定標題項目對齊。

trans-unit.source: The caption element is aligned with the right side of the table.
trans-unit.target: 標題項目與資料表的右邊對齊。

trans-unit.source: The caption element is aligned with the top of the table.
trans-unit.target: 標題項目與資料表的頂端對齊。

trans-unit.source: Additional accessibility support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is provided by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 其他可存取性支援<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項由提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A> property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Caption%2A>屬性來指定要呈現的 HTML 標題項目中的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CaptionAlign%2A> is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CaptionAlign%2A>儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CaptionAlign%2A> property to specify that the HTML caption element in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control should be rendered on the left side of the control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CaptionAlign%2A>屬性來指定 HTML 標題中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項應該呈現控制項的左邊。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距數 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 -1，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellPadding%2A> property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellPadding%2A>屬性，即可控制的儲存格的內容與儲存格的框線之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 指定的填補量會加入至儲存格的四個邊。

trans-unit.source: All cells in the same column of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control have the same width.
trans-unit.target: 在相同的資料行中的所有資料格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項具有相同的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount is applied to the widest cell and all other cells in the column are adjusted to that cell width.
trans-unit.target: 填補數量會套用到最寬的資料格和資料行中的所有資料格會調整為該儲存格的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, all cells in the same row have the same height.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有資料格具有相同的高度。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount is applied to the tallest cell in the row and all other cells in the row are adjusted to that cell height.
trans-unit.target: 填補數量會套用到資料列中最高的儲存格和資料列中的所有資料格會調整為該儲存格的高度。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 個別儲存格大小不能指定。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the spacing between cells, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellSpacing%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整儲存格之間的間距，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellSpacing%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellPadding%2A> property to specify the amount of spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellPadding%2A>屬性，以指定的儲存格的內容和儲存格的框線之間的間距大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between cells.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格之間的間距數量，以像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。
