trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellSpacing%2A> property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellSpacing%2A>屬性，即可控制中的相鄰資料格之間的間距<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 垂直和水平，則會套用這個間距。

trans-unit.source: The cell spacing is uniform for the entire control.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格間距是一致的整個控制項。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell spacing between rows or columns cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 不能指定個別資料格的資料列或資料行之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a value greater than 0, and then set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GridLines%2A> property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定這個屬性的值大於 0，，然後再設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GridLines%2A>屬性相鄰的資料格的框線之間顯示儲存格框線的值，顯示間隔。

trans-unit.source: In this situation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellSpacing%2A> property controls the size of the gap.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellSpacing%2A>屬性控制的差距大小。

trans-unit.source: To adjust the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellPadding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整儲存格的內容與儲存格的框線之間的間距，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellPadding%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellSpacing%2A> property to specify the amount of spacing between adjacent cells.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CellSpacing%2A>屬性，以指定的相鄰的儲存格之間的間距大小。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Switches the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control to the specified mode.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項切換為指定的模式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A> method to programmatically switch the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control between edit, insert, and read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A>方法來以程式設計方式切換<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>之間編輯、 插入和唯讀模式的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method also updates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A> property with the specified mode.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也會更新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A>屬性以指定的模式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different mode values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的模式值。

trans-unit.source: Mode
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯模式，可讓使用者更新記錄的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於插入模式下，可讓使用者將新記錄新增至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於唯讀模式，這是一般顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A> method to return the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to read-only mode whenever the user navigates to another record.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A>方法以傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項為唯讀模式，每當使用者巡覽至另一筆記錄。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of a command row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓您設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中命令資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of a command row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中命令資料列的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CommandRowStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of a command row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CommandRowStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制中的命令列的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A command row contains the command buttons to perform operations such as editing, deleting, and inserting.
trans-unit.target: 命令列包含要執行作業，例如編輯、 刪除和插入的命令按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `CommandRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `CommandRowStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CommandRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CommandRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CommandRowStyle%2A> property to specify the font and style settings for the command row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CommandRowStyle%2A>屬性，以指定的命令列中的字型和樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties" /> that contains the properties for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedFieldProperties" />，含有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField" /> 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField" /> object that represents an automatically generated row field using the specified field properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的欄位屬性，建立表示自動產生資料列欄位的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField" /> that contains the field properties specified by the <paramref name="fieldProperties" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AutoGeneratedField" />，包含 <paramref name="fieldProperties" /> 參數所指定的欄位屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateAutoGeneratedRow%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create an automatically generated row field using the specified field properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateAutoGeneratedRow%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來建立使用指定的欄位屬性的自動產生的資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> class, you can override this method to create your own automatically generated row field.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以建立您自己的自動產生的資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: The data item for which to create the automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: 要建立自動產生資料列欄位的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates a set of automatically generated row fields for the specified data item.
trans-unit.target: 針對指定的資料項目，建立一組自動產生的資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> that contains the automatically generated row fields for the specified data item.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，含有指定資料項目的自動產生資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateAutoGeneratedRows%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create a set of automatically generated row fields for the current data item.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateAutoGeneratedRows%2A>方法透過呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來建立一組自動產生資料列的目前資料的項目欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control does not have any properties or attributes from which to generate fields.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項沒有任何可以從中產生欄位的屬性 (Property) 或屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> class, you can override this method to create your own set of automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以建立您自己的自動產生的資料列欄位集。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> that represents the data source for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that this method is being called during data binding; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示此方法是在資料繫結期間呼叫，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates the control hierarchy used to render the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立用來呈現 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項的控制階層架構。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateChildControls%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create the control hierarchy for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateChildControls%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來建立控制項的控制項階層架構。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataSource" /> returns a null <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataSource" /> 會傳回 null <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="dataSource" /> is not an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> and cannot return a total row count.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataSource" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 且無法傳回資料列總數。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="dataBinding" /> is <see langword="false" /> and <paramref name="dataSource" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataBinding" /> 為 <see langword="false" /> 且 <paramref name="dataSource" /> 不會實作 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 介面。

trans-unit.source: \- or -

<paramref name="dataSource" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface and <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging" /> is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataSource" /> 不會實作 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 介面，且 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging" /> 設為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> class, you can override this method to create your own control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以建立您自己的控制項階層架構。

trans-unit.source: Creates a default table style object for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項的預設資料表樣式物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains the default table style for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項的預設資料表樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateControlStyle%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create its default table style object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateControlStyle%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來建立其預設資料表樣式物件。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the default style setting of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle> object, this method also sets the properties in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 除了預設樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle>物件，這個方法也設定下表中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Initial value
trans-unit.target: Initial value

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> class, you can override this method to return a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle" /> object with custom settings.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以傳回<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle" />利用自訂設定的物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> object that gets passed to the Select command.
trans-unit.target: 建立傳遞至 Select 命令的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> that gets passed to the Select command
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至 Select 命令的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that gets passed to the Select command.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來建立<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>取得傳遞給 Select 命令的物件。

trans-unit.source: The data item for which to create the row fields.
trans-unit.target: 要建立資料列欄位的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use the data item to create the automatically generated row fields; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示使用資料項目來建立自動產生的資料列欄位，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates the complete set of automatically generated and user-defined row fields used to generate the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 建立自動產生與使用者定義資料列欄位的完整集合，以便用來產生控制階層架構。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> that contains both the automatically generated and the user-defined row fields for the specified data item.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，同時含有指定資料項目的自動產生與使用者定義資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateFieldSet%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create the complete set of row fields for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateFieldSet%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來建立一組完整的資料列欄位的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property is set to `true`, automatically generated row fields are appended to the user-defined row fields contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>屬性設定為`true`為自動產生資料列欄位會附加至包含的使用者定義的資料列欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: To create the automatically generated row fields based on the data item, pass in `true` for the `useDataSource` parameter; otherwise, the automatically generated row fields are created based on properties of the existing row fields in the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立的自動產生的資料列欄位，根據資料的項目，請傳入`true`如`useDataSource`參數; 否則會自動產生的資料列欄位會根據建立的現有資料列欄位控制項中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> class, you can override this method to create your own set of row fields.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以建立您自己的資料列欄位集。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the data item to display.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示之資料項目以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> object using the specified item index, row type, and row state.
trans-unit.target: 建立使用指定項目索引、資料列型別和資料列狀態的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> with the specified item index, row type, and row state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" />，具有指定的項目索引、資料列型別和資料列狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateRow%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateRow%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>物件。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> class, you can override this method to return a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> object with custom settings.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以傳回<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" />利用自訂設定的物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates the containing table for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項的包含資料表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" /> that represents the containing table for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項的包含資料表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateTable%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create a table that acts as the container for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateTable%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來建立資料表做為控制項的容器。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current data-entry mode of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項目前的資料輸入模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A> property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A>屬性來判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯、 插入或唯讀模式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different mode values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的模式值。

trans-unit.source: Mode
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯模式，可讓使用者更新記錄的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於插入模式下，可讓使用者將新記錄新增至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於唯讀模式，這是一般顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: This value is normally set automatically by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control by when the New, Update, Insert, Delete, or Cancel command button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 這個值通常自動設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>時新增、 更新、 插入、 刪除或取消命令按鈕控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically change the mode by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用，以也以程式設計方式變更模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ChangeMode%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control changes modes, the events in the following table are raised.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項變更模式，則下表中的事件會引發。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a routine when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您建立自訂事件處理常式，在事件發生時執行常式。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: Event - 事件

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a command button that changes the mode of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is clicked, but after the mode changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於變更的模式，在命令按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>按一下控制項時，但模式變更之後。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a command button that changes the mode of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is clicked, but before the mode changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於變更的模式，在命令按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>按一下控制項時，但模式變更之前。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A> property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A>屬性來判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯、 插入或唯讀模式。

trans-unit.source: If the user attempts to navigate to a different record while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode, the paging operation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者嘗試瀏覽至不同的資料錄 while<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯模式，在分頁作業取消。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind" /> method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls should override <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PerformDataBinding%2A> instead of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataBind%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項應該覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PerformDataBinding%2A>而不是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataBind%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item bound to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the data item bound to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItem%2A> property to access the data item bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItem%2A>屬性來存取資料的項目繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The data item is often used to access the field values of the current record directly.
trans-unit.target: 資料的項目通常用於直接存取目前記錄的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The type of the <xref:System.Object> returned by this property varies depending on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 型別<xref:System.Object>傳回此屬性會根據資料來源而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: For example, when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> object is returned.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項，<xref:System.Data.DataRowView>物件傳回。

trans-unit.source: This property is available only after data binding has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 只有在發生資料繫結之後，才使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Before data binding occurs, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結之前，這個屬性會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: This property is also not applicable when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode and returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性時，也不適用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於插入模式，並傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItem%2A> property to determine the value of a field in the data item.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItem%2A>屬性來判斷資料的項目中欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得基礎資料來源中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 基礎資料來源中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemCount%2A> property to determine the total number of records in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 啟用分頁功能時 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性`true`)，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemCount%2A>屬性，以判斷基礎資料來源中的記錄總數。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control displays only one record at a time, this value also corresponds to the total number of pages required to display every record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項會顯示一次只有一筆記錄，此值也會對應至顯示資料來源中的每一筆記錄所需的分頁總數。

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the current record from the underlying data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷目前的記錄從基礎資料來源的索引，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemCount%2A> property to determine the number of items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemCount%2A>屬性來判斷資料來源中的項目數。

trans-unit.source: This value is used to display the page count in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control contained within a custom pager row.
trans-unit.target: 這個值用來顯示中的頁面計數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>自訂頁面巡覽區資料列內所包含的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the item being displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得項目的索引，此項目來自基礎資料來源，目前顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the data item being displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 以零起始的資料項目索引，此資料項目來自基礎資料來源，目前顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中。

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex%2A> property to determine the index of the currently displayed record.
trans-unit.target: 啟用分頁功能時 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AllowPaging%2A>屬性`true`)，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex%2A>屬性來判斷目前所顯示的記錄的索引。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically change the displayed record.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式變更顯示的記錄。

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled, you can also use this property to determine the page number of the record displayed; however, be aware that this property is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: 啟用分頁功能時，您也可以使用這個屬性來判斷顯示; 記錄的頁面數目不過，請注意這個屬性是以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: To determine the total number of items in the data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷資料來源中的項目總數，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemCount%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex%2A> property to determine the index of the current item in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataItemIndex%2A>屬性來判斷資料來源中目前項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: This value is used to display the current page number in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control contained in a custom pager row.
trans-unit.target: 這個值用來顯示在目前的頁碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>自訂頁面巡覽區資料列中包含的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object that represents the primary key of the displayed record.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件，表示所顯示資料錄的主索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> that represents the primary key of the displayed record.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" />，表示所顯示資料錄的主索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object that represents the key field or fields for the current record.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>設定屬性，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項會自動建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件，代表目前記錄的索引鍵欄位。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKey%2A> property to get this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKey%2A>屬性來取得這<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to obtain the keys and their corresponding values for the fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用來取得索引鍵和其對應的值中指定的欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: As a shortcut, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.SelectedValue%2A> property to determine the value of the first key field listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 快速的方式，您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.SelectedValue%2A>屬性來判斷中所列的第一個索引鍵欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKey%2A> property to determine the key field and corresponding value for the current record.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKey%2A>屬性來判斷索引鍵欄位及目前記錄的對應值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array that contains the names of the key fields for the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定陣列，陣列中包含資料來源的索引鍵欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the names of the key fields of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，包含資料來源的索引鍵欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property to specify a comma-separated list of field names that represent the primary key of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性來指定代表資料來源的主索引鍵的欄位名稱的逗號分隔清單。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object that represents the key field or fields for the current record and stores it in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>設定屬性，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項會自動建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件，代表目前記錄的索引鍵欄位，並將其儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKey%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is also set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control automatically ensures that the field or fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>屬性也會設為`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制會自動確定中指定的欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性是唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property for the automatic updating, deleting, and inserting features of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to work.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性自動更新、 刪除和插入功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>運作的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of a row field is set to `false`, the row is not displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control and the data for the row does not make a round trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>屬性的資料列欄位設定為`false`，資料列不會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制和資料列的資料不會反覆存取用戶端。

trans-unit.source: If you want the data for a row that is not visible to make a round trip, add the field name to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要看不到構成來回行程的資料列資料，加入欄位名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property to identify the key field for the data source bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性來識別資料來源的索引鍵欄位繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the default data-entry mode of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項的預設資料輸入模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="DetailsViewMode.ReadOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> property to specify whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control returns to edit, insert, or read-only mode after an edit or insert operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A>屬性來指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項的編輯或 insert 作業執行後返回編輯、 插入或唯讀模式。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control returns to read-only mode; however, you can keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in edit or insert mode by setting this property to the appropriate value.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>傳回以唯讀模式的控制項; 不過，您可以保留<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制中編輯，或插入模式下，此屬性設定為適當的值。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different mode values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的模式值。

trans-unit.source: Mode
trans-unit.target: 模式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯模式，可讓使用者更新記錄的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於插入模式下，可讓使用者將新記錄新增至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於唯讀模式，這是一般顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A> property to specify that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control should remain in edit mode after a record has been updated.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DefaultMode%2A>屬性來指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項應該仍會處於編輯模式之後已更新記錄。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewMode" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the current record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的資料錄從資料來源中刪除。

trans-unit.source: The deletion does not occur if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in Insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果不會刪除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於插入模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting> event is raised immediately before the item is deleted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>之前刪除的項目，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` to cancel the deletion.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`取消刪除。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在頁面上控制項執行刪除作業時所呼叫的方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面上控制項執行刪除作業時所呼叫的方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of the data rows when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可以讓您設定當 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項處於編輯模式時的資料列外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the data rows when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，表示當 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項處於編輯模式時的資料列樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EditRowStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the data rows when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EditRowStyle%2A>來控制資料的外觀屬性的資料列時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EditRowStyle%2A> property to specify the font and style settings for the data rows when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EditRowStyle%2A>屬性來指定資料的字型和樣式設定資料列時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of the empty data row displayed when the data source bound to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，可以讓您設定當繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項的資料來源不含任何資料錄時，顯示之空白資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that allows you to set the appearance of the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，可以讓您設定空白資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the empty data row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制中的空白資料列的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄時，會顯示空白資料列。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property to specify the font and style settings for the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>屬性來指定空白資料列的字型和樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the empty data row rendered when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定空白資料之使用者定義的內容，該資料列呈現於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項繫結至不包含任何資料錄的資料來源時。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the custom content for the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，包含空白資料列的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 空白資料列會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制當繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄。

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用，以定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI)，空白資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the null row, first place `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定 null 的資料列的自訂範本，先將`<EmptyDataTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<EmptyDataTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制的空白資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the built-in UI for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，設定為空的資料列使用內建的 UI<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>屬性會優先。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property to create a custom empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>屬性來建立自訂的空白資料列。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the empty data row rendered when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定空白資料列中顯示的文字，該資料列呈現於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項繫結至不包含任何資料錄的資料來源時。

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 要在空白資料列中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 空白資料列會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制當繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A> property to specify the text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A>屬性來指定要顯示空的資料列中的文字。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制的空白資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI)，空白資料列，藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>屬性會優先。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A> is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A>儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A> property to specify the text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EmptyDataText%2A>屬性來指定要顯示空的資料列中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data-model validation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值指出是否啟用資料模型驗證。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if data model validation is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用資料模型驗證，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side callback functions are used for paging operations in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項的分頁作業中使用用戶端回呼函式 (Callback Function)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use client-side callback functions for paging operations; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將用戶端回呼函式用於分頁作業，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EnablePagingCallbacks%2A> property to specify whether paging operations are performed using client-side callback functions.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EnablePagingCallbacks%2A>屬性來指定是否分頁作業將會使用用戶端回呼函式。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, paging is performed using the callback feature, which prevents the need to post the page back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 啟用時，分頁是使用回撥功能，可避免需要將頁面回傳至伺服器來執行。

trans-unit.source: The client-side paging feature is only supported in Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 and later and Netscape 6.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端分頁功能僅支援在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.5 及更新版本及 Netscape 6.0 及更新版本。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EnablePagingCallbacks%2A> is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EnablePagingCallbacks%2A>儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EnablePagingCallbacks%2A> property to enable the use of client-side callback functions for paging operations.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.EnablePagingCallbacks%2A>屬性來啟用用戶端的回呼函式用於分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind" /> method after verifying that the data listing control requires data binding and that a valid data source control is specified.
trans-unit.target: 在確認資料清單控制項需要資料繫結，且已指定有效的資料來源控制項後，呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The data binding does not occur if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in Insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結不會發生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於插入模式。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> class, you can override this method to implement additional processing before the control is data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />類別，您可以覆寫這個方法以實作額外的處理資料繫結控制項之前。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> used to store the field values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" />，用於儲存欄位值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include read-only fields; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示包括唯讀欄位，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include the primary key field or fields; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示包括主索引鍵欄位，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the values of each field displayed and stores them in the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取每個顯示欄位的值，並將它們儲存在指定的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ExtractRowValues%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to retrieve the values of each field.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ExtractRowValues%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項，以擷取每個欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The values can them be used for data source operations.
trans-unit.target: 它們可用於資料來源作業的值可以。

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the extracted values include read-only fields and key fields by using the `includeReadOnlyFields` and `includePrimaryKey` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定擷取的值使用是否包含唯讀欄位和索引鍵欄位`includeReadOnlyFields`和`includePrimaryKey`參數，分別。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> class, you can override this method to create your own routine to retrieve the field values.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以建立您自己的常式，以擷取欄位值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of the header column in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓您設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中標頭資料行的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the header column in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中標頭資料行的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FieldHeaderStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the field header column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FieldHeaderStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制中的欄位標頭資料行的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This is the column that contains the field names of the data values.
trans-unit.target: 這是包含資料值的欄位名稱的資料行。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `FieldHeaderStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `FieldHeaderStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FieldHeaderStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FieldHeaderStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FieldHeaderStyle%2A> property to specify the font and style settings for the field header row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FieldHeaderStyle%2A>屬性來指定欄位標頭資料列的字型和樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> objects that represent the explicitly declared row fields in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 物件的集合，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中明確宣告的資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" /> that contains all explicitly declared row fields in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCollection" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中所有明確宣告的資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: When you explicitly declare the row fields for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, these row fields are stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> property (collection).
trans-unit.target: 當您明確宣告的資料列欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項，這些資料列的欄位會儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>屬性 （集合）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection also allows you to programmatically manage the collection of explicitly declared rows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>集合也可讓您以程式設計方式管理明確宣告的資料列的集合。

trans-unit.source: Explicitly declared row fields can be used in combination with automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: 明確宣告的資料列欄位可用於與自動產生的資料列欄位搭配使用。

trans-unit.source: When both are used, explicitly declared row fields are rendered first, followed by the automatically generated row fields.
trans-unit.target: 同時使用時，明確宣告的資料列會首先呈現欄位，後面接著會自動產生的資料列欄位。

trans-unit.source: Automatically generated row fields are not added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生的資料列欄位不會加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Different row field types determine the behavior of the rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: 不同的資料列欄位型別決定控制項中的資料列的行為。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different row field types that can be used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示不同的資料列可以在中使用的欄位類型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Row field type
trans-unit.target: 資料列欄位類型

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Displays the value of a field in a data source as text.
trans-unit.target: 以文字中顯示資料來源中欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: Displays a command button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示命令按鈕在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to display a row with a custom button control, such as an Add or a Remove button.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您顯示具有自訂按鈕控制項，例如新增或移除按鈕的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Displays a check box in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在核取方塊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This row field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料列的欄位型別通常用於顯示具有布林值的欄位。

trans-unit.source: Displays built-in command buttons to perform edit, insert, or delete operations in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示內建命令按鈕來執行編輯、 插入或刪除作業<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源中的欄位的值顯示為超連結。

trans-unit.source: This row field type allows you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料列的欄位型別可讓您將第二個欄位繫結至超連結的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Displays an image in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在影像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Displays user-defined content for a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control according to a specified template.
trans-unit.target: 顯示使用者定義的內容中的資料列的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項根據指定的範本。

trans-unit.source: This row field type allows you to create a custom row field.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料列的欄位型別可讓您建立自訂的資料列的欄位。

trans-unit.source: To explicitly declare the row fields for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 明確宣告的資料列欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制，第一組<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Next, add opening and closing `<Fields>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，加入 開啟和關閉`<Fields>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Finally, list the row fields that you want to include between the opening and closing `<Fields>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 最後，列出您想要包含在開頭和結尾之間的資料列欄位`<Fields>`標記。

trans-unit.source: The row fields are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control in the order that the row fields appear in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 資料列欄位會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>順序的資料列欄位會出現在控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Although you can programmatically add row fields to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection, it is easier to list the row fields declaratively in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of each row field to show or hide the row field.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以透過程式設計方式加入資料列欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>集合，會比較容易列出的資料列欄位以宣告方式在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制，然後使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>每個資料列欄位来顯示或隱藏資料列欄位的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of a row field is set to `false`, the row is not displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control and the data for the row does not make a round trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>屬性的資料列欄位設定為`false`，資料列不會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制和資料列的資料不會反覆存取用戶端。

trans-unit.source: If you want the data for a row that is not visible to make a round trip, add the field name to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要看不到構成來回行程的資料列資料，加入欄位名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively add row fields to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式，將資料列欄位加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> object that represents the footer row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> 物件，其表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中的頁尾資料列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> that represents the footer row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中的頁尾資料列。

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾資料列會顯示在底部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterRow%2A> property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object that represents the footer row.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterRow%2A>屬性以程式設計方式存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>物件，代表頁尾資料列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A> property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control creates the footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A>屬性之後，才可被<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項建立頁尾資料列中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the footer row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式操作頁尾資料列，例如當加入自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterRow%2A> property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: 修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterRow%2A>後必須執行屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項已呈現，否則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項將會覆寫任何變更。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制頁尾資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterRow%2A> property to access the footer row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterRow%2A>屬性來存取頁尾資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>期間控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control within the custom footer row is then updated with the current page number.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>自訂頁尾資料列中的控制項則會更新為目前的頁碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of the footer row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，可以讓您設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中頁尾資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the footer row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中頁尾資料列的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾資料列會顯示在底部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制頁尾資料列中的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `FooterStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `FooterStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FooterStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FooterStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A> property to specify the font and style settings for the footer row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>屬性，以指定頁尾資料列的字型和樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the footer row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中，頁尾資料列的使用者定義內容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the custom content for the footer row.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，包含頁尾資料列的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾資料列會顯示在底部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the footer row by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用頁尾資料列定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI)<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the footer row, first place `<FooterTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定頁尾資料列的自訂範本，先將`<FooterTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<FooterTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<FooterTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制頁尾資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can simply display text in the footer row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以只顯示文字頁尾資料列中藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性會優先。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property to create a custom footer row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性以建立自訂的頁尾資料列。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the footer row of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項頁尾資料列的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the footer row.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾資料列中所要顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾資料列會顯示在底部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> property to specify the text to display in the footer row.
