trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>屬性來指定要在頁尾資料列中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制頁尾資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the footer row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI) 頁尾資料列設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性會優先。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A> property to specify the text to display in the footer row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterText%2A>屬性來指定要在頁尾資料列中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a callback event that targets a control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回以控制項為目標之回呼事件的結果。

trans-unit.source: The results of the callback.
trans-unit.target: 回呼的結果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> interface and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> to retrieve data and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GetCallbackResult%2A> method to return the retrieved data to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制實作<xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler>介面並使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>來擷取資料和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GetCallbackResult%2A>方法來擷取的資料傳回至控制項。

trans-unit.source: The control that initiated the callback.
trans-unit.target: 初始化回呼的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The callback code.
trans-unit.target: 回呼程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns the callback string created using the specified argument.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的引數，傳回建立的回呼字串。

trans-unit.source: The complete callback string to be sent to the client.
trans-unit.target: 要傳送至用戶端的完整回呼字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gridline style for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項的格線樣式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="GridLines.Both" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="GridLines.Both" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GridLines%2A> property to specify the gridline style for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GridLines%2A>屬性來指定格線樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available styles.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Style
trans-unit.target: 樣式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: No gridlines are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 不顯示格線。

trans-unit.source: Displays the horizontal gridlines only.
trans-unit.target: 顯示水平格線。

trans-unit.source: Displays the vertical gridlines only.
trans-unit.target: 顯示垂直格線。

trans-unit.source: Displays both the horizontal and vertical gridlines.
trans-unit.target: 顯示水平及垂直格線。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GridLines%2A> property to hide all gridlines in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.GridLines%2A>屬性來隱藏所有的格線中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> object that represents the header row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> 物件，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中的標頭資料列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> that represents the header row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中的標頭資料列。

trans-unit.source: The header row is displayed at the top of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 標頭資料列會顯示在頂端<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderRow%2A> property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object that represents the header row.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderRow%2A>屬性以程式設計方式存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>物件，表示標頭資料列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A> property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control creates the header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A>屬性之後，才可被<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項建立中的標頭資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the header row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式操作標頭資料列，例如當加入自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderRow%2A> property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: 修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderRow%2A>後必須執行屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項已呈現，否則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項將會覆寫任何變更。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderRow%2A> property to access the header row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderRow%2A>屬性來存取的標頭資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>期間控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control within the custom header row is then updated with the current page number.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制項內的自訂標頭資料列則會更新為目前的頁碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of the header row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，可以讓您設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中頁首資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the header row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中標頭資料列的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The header row is displayed at the top of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 標頭資料列會顯示在頂端<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the header row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制中的標頭資料列的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `HeaderStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `HeaderStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HeaderStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `HeaderStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderStyle%2A> property to specify the font and style settings for the header row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性，以指定的標頭資料列的字型和樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the header row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中，標頭資料列的使用者定義內容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the custom content for the header row.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，包含標頭資料列的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: The header row is displayed at the top of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 標頭資料列會顯示在頂端<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the header row by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用的標頭資料列定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI)<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the header row, first place `<HeaderTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定標頭資料列的自訂範本，請先將`<HeaderTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<HeaderTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<HeaderTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the header row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制標頭資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can simply display text in the header row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以只顯示文字標頭列中藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性會優先。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property to create a custom header row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性以建立自訂標頭資料列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A> property to specify the text to display in the header row.

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A> property to specify the text to display in the header row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderText%2A>屬性來指定要在標頭資料列中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁面上 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項的水平對齊。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="HorizontalAlign.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="HorizontalAlign.NotSet" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HorizontalAlign%2A> property to specify the horizontal alignment of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control within the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HorizontalAlign%2A>屬性，以指定的水平對齊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>頁面內控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different horizontal alignment styles.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的水平對齊樣式。

trans-unit.source: HorizontalAlign value
trans-unit.target: HorizontalAlign 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The horizontal alignment of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has not been set.
trans-unit.target: 水平對齊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>尚未設定控制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is left-aligned on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項是在頁面上靠左對齊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is centered on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項置於頁面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is right-aligned on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項是在頁面上靠右對齊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is aligned with both the left and right margins of the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項對齊頁面的左、 右邊界。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HorizontalAlign%2A> property to specify that a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control should be centered on the page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HorizontalAlign%2A>屬性來指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項應該置於頁面。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> that contains the pager row.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" />，包含頁面巡覽列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource" /> that contains the data for the current page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource" />，包含目前頁面的資料。

trans-unit.source: Creates the pager row for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項的頁面巡覽列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializePager%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to create the pager row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializePager%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來建立頁面巡覽區列。

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object that contains the navigation controls using the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource> object contained in the `pagedDataSource` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 它會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件，其中包含使用之屬性的導覽控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource>中所含物件`pagedDataSource`參數。

trans-unit.source: The cell is then added to the row specified by the `row` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 資料格就會加入至指定的資料列`row`參數。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> class, you can override this method to create your own pager row.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以建立您自己的頁面巡覽區列。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> that corresponds to the row.
trans-unit.target: 對應到資料列的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializeRow%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to initialize the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializeRow%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>初始化指定的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>物件。

trans-unit.source: The row is initialized for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object contained in the `field` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 資料列會初始化為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>中所含物件`field`參數。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> class, you can override this method to create your own custom row.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以建立您自己自訂的資料列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to perform page validation when the method is called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示呼叫此方法時會執行頁面驗證，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的資料錄插入資料來源。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InsertItem%2A> method to programmatically insert the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於插入模式下，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InsertItem%2A>方法來以程式設計方式插入資料來源中的 目前的記錄。

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to insert the current record from outside of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常使用於您要插入的外部目前從資料錄<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制，例如來自不同頁面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control must be in insert mode when this method is called; otherwise, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項必須在插入模式下呼叫，否則這個方法時<xref:System.Web.HttpException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To specify whether page validation is performed before the insert operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定是否要將頁面驗證執行插入作業之前，請使用`causesValidation`參數。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting> events.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法也會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control is not in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項未處於插入模式時，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> 控制項關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在頁面上控制項執行插入作業時所呼叫的方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面上控制項執行插入作業時所呼叫的方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of the data rows in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓您在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項處於插入模式時，設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the data rows in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的參考，表示當 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項處於插入模式時，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中資料列的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control are displayed using this style when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 資料列中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>使用這個樣式來顯示控制項時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於插入模式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InsertRowStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the data rows in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InsertRowStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制插入模式中的資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `InsertRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `InsertRowStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `InsertRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `InsertRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InsertRowStyle%2A> property to specify the font and style settings for the data rows when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InsertRowStyle%2A>屬性來指定資料的字型和樣式設定資料列時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於插入模式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the data type to check.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示要檢查的資料型別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified data type can be bound to a field in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的資料型別是否可以繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中的欄位。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified data type can be bound to a field in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定資料型別可以繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中的欄位，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.IsBindableType%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to determine whether the specified data type can be bound to a field in the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.IsBindableType%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項來決定指定的資料類型是否可以繫結至控制項中的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control supports the following data types:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項支援下列資料類型：

trans-unit.source: All primitive data types, such as <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.Byte>, and <xref:System.Int32>
trans-unit.target: 所有的基本資料類型，例如<xref:System.Boolean>， <xref:System.Byte>，和 <xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> class, you can override this method to add or restrict the data types that can be used in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />類別，您可以覆寫這個方法，以加入或限制可用於資料型別<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" />控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a button within a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中的按鈕時會發生這個事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand> event is raised when a button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand>內按鈕時引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷命令名稱並按之按鈕的命令引數。

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the current record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷目前記錄的索引，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.PageIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand> event to handle a button click in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand>事件，以處理按鈕按一下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the Add Contact button, the item is added to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下 [新增連絡人] 按鈕時，要將項目加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a record is created in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中建立記錄時會發生這個事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> event is raised each time a record is created in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated>的記錄建立在每次引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This can occur when the control is first rendered, or when the user navigates to another record.
trans-unit.target: 當第一次呈現控制項，或當使用者巡覽至另一筆記錄，也可能會發生。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content to a row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此事件以提供執行自訂的常式，例如加入到資料列的自訂內容時就會發生此事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: You can access the header, footer, and pager rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderRow%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterRow%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.TopPagerRow%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BottomPagerRow%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取頁首、 頁尾和頁面巡覽區中的資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderRow%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterRow%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.TopPagerRow%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BottomPagerRow%2A>屬性，分別。

trans-unit.source: To access one of the data rows, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取其中的資料列，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated> event to update a custom pager row with current paging statistics.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCreated>事件，以使用目前的分頁統計資料更新自訂頁面巡覽區列。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a Delete button within a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control is clicked, but after the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項內的 [刪除] 按鈕時，但是在刪除作業之後。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted> event is raised when a Delete button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is clicked, but after the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted>內的 [刪除] 按鈕時引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>按一下控制項時，但之後刪除作業。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the delete operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查刪除作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷受影響的資料列和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted> event to refresh a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control after a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control performs a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted>事件，以重新整理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項執行刪除作業。

trans-unit.source: This keeps the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control synchronized with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>與控制項同步處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a Delete button within a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control is clicked, but before the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項內的 [刪除] 按鈕時，但是在刪除作業之前。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting> event is raised when a Delete button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is clicked, but before the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>內的 [刪除] 按鈕時引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>按一下控制項時，但刪除作業之前。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the delete operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消刪除作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the index of the record being deleted and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷要刪除記錄的索引，並指出應該取消刪除作業。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the delete operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消刪除作業，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>集合，如有必要之前的值會傳遞至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting> event to cancel the delete operation if the user attempts to delete the last item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>取消刪除作業，如果使用者嘗試刪除最後一個項目，從事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Insert button within a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control is clicked, but after the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項內的 [插入] 按鈕時，但是在插入作業之後。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserted>內的 [插入] 按鈕時引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>按一下控制項時，但是在插入作業之後。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the insert operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查插入作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷受影響的資料列和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To keep the control in insert mode after an insert operation, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要保留在插入模式下的控制項，在插入作業之後，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 如此一來，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>與控制項同步處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting> event is raised when an Insert button within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is clicked, but before the insert operation.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the insert operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消 insert 作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to indicate that the insert operation should be canceled.

trans-unit.source: To cancel the insert operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventArgs.Values%2A> collection, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Update button within a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control is clicked, but after the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項內的 [更新] 按鈕時，但在更新作業之後。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated> event is raised when an Update button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is clicked, but after the update operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated>內的 [更新] 按鈕時引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>按一下控制項時，但是在更新作業之後。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查更新作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷受影響的資料列和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您還可以指出是否已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To keep the control in edit mode after an update operation, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 為了讓控制項處於編輯模式，在更新作業之後，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated> event to refresh a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control after a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control performs an update operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdated>事件，以重新整理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項執行更新作業。

trans-unit.source: This keeps the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control synchronized with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>與控制項同步處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Update button within a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control is clicked, but before the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項內的 [更新] 按鈕時，但在更新作業之前。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating> event is raised when an Update button within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is clicked, but before the update operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating>內的 [更新] 按鈕時引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>按一下控制項時，但在更新作業之前。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消更新作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the index of the record being updated and to indicate that the update operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您決定更新記錄的索引，並指出應該取消更新作業。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the update operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消更新作業，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>集合，如有必要之前的值會傳遞至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: A common way to use these collections is to HTML-encode the values supplied by the user before they are stored in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用這些集合的常見方式是將 HTML 編碼再將它們儲存在資料來源中，使用者所提供的值。

trans-unit.source: This helps to prevent script injection attacks.
trans-unit.target: 這有助於防止指令碼資料隱碼攻擊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemUpdating> event to HTML-encode the values entered by the user before a record is updated in the data source.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the properties in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control that need to be persisted, even when the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 載入需要保存之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項中屬性的狀態，即使 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState" /> 屬性設為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.LoadControlState%2A> method is used to load the state of the properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.LoadControlState%2A>方法用來載入中的屬性狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項需要保存，即使<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充主要由控制項開發人員使用這個方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 載入先前儲存的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.LoadViewState%2A> method is used to load the previously saved view state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.LoadViewState%2A>方法用來載入先前儲存的檢視狀態的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but after the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode" /> property is updated.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項嘗試在編輯、插入和唯讀模式之間變更，但是在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode" /> 屬性更新之後。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A> property is updated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged>就會引發事件時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項嘗試變更之間編輯、 插入和唯讀模式，但之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A>更新屬性。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as synchronizing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control with another control, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，如同步處理的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>與另一個控制項，此事件發生時的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged> event to display the current mode in the header row.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanged>事件標頭列中顯示目前的模式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode" /> property is updated.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項嘗試在編輯、插入和唯讀模式之間變更，但是在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode" /> 屬性更新之前。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control attempts to change between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A> property is updated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>就會引發事件時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項嘗試前編輯、 插入和唯讀模式之間變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CurrentMode%2A>更新屬性。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the mode change, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消模式變更時就會發生此事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the new mode, to determine whether the mode change was a result of the user canceling an edit operation, or to cancel the mode change.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您判斷新的模式，來判斷模式變更是否已取消編輯作業，使用者的結果，或取消模式變更。

trans-unit.source: To determine the new mode, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷新的模式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the mode change was a result of the user canceling an edit operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷模式變更是否取消編輯作業之使用者的結果，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the mode change by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定取消模式變更<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging> event to disable the paging feature when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ModeChanging>事件，以停用分頁功能時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the Web server control is passed up the page's user interface (UI) server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 決定 Web 伺服器控制項的事件是否要向上傳遞至網頁的使用者介面 (UI) 伺服器控制階層架構。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已取消，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.OnBubbleEvent%2A> method implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to pass events from child controls to the page hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.OnBubbleEvent%2A>方法實作<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，將事件從子控制項傳遞至頁面階層。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.OnBubbleEvent(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.OnBubbleEvent(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.OnBubbleEvent(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.OnBubbleEvent(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control is not bound to a data source control, the paging operation was not canceled, and an event handler is not registered for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 控制項未繫結至資料來源控制項、未取消分頁作業，以及事件未註冊事件處理常式時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.OnPageIndexChanging(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.OnPageIndexChanging(System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPageEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
